title: Finance Committee approves $16.16M Southwick budget, a $400K increase - MassLive.com
content: Finance Committee approves $16.16M Southwick budget, a $400K increase  MassLive.com
description: The Southwick Finance Committee voted to approve the fiscal 2023 town budget Tuesday evening with an increase of nearly $400,000 from the fiscal 2022 budget.
